ModMetaData.name: Do Not Disturb
ModMetaData.author: 1000101, Dingo
ModMetaData.description:
When pawns wish to remain undisturbed, they will forbid their room doors.
You can configure some aspects of this mod in the Mod Settings menu.
Original mod by E (aka 1000101), adapted for RimWorld v1.1 by Dingo.
